title: Here is a list of 20 influential articles on multimodal machine learning (ML) published before 2023. These articles cover various aspects of multimodal ML, including theory, applications, and advancements in the field
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** by Tadas Baltru≈°aitis, Chaitanya Ahuja, and Louis-Philippe Morency
A comprehensive survey that categorizes and reviews the state of multimodal machine learning
**"Deep Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"** by Hao Wang, Dit-Yan Yeung
A survey focusing on deep learning approaches for multimodal representation learning
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"** by Soujanya Poria
note: Erik Cambria, Devamanyu Hazarika, Navonil Majumder, Amir Zadeh, and Louis-Philippe Morency (2017

title: Discusses the challenges and baseline methods for multimodal sentiment analysis
**"Multimodal Deep Learning"** by Ngiam, Jiquan, et al
One of the early works on using deep learning for multimodal data, focusing on audio and video
**"Learning Transferable Visual Models From Natural Language Supervision"** by Alec Radford, Jong Wook Kim
Introduces CLIP, a model that learns visual concepts from natural language descriptions
**"VisualBERT: A Simple and Performant Baseline for Vision and Language"** by Liunian Harold Li
Proposes VisualBERT, a model that integrates visual and textual information for various tasks
**"ViLBERT: Pretraining Task-Agnostic Visiolinguistic Representations for Vision-and-Language Tasks"** by Jiasen Lu
Introduces ViLBERT, a model that extends BERT to handle both visual and textual data
Learning Cross-Modality Encoder Representations from Transformers"** by Hao Tan and Mohit Bansal
Proposes LXMERT, a model that learns cross-modality representations using transformers
**"Unicoder-VL: A Universal Encoder for Vision and Language by Cross-modal Pre-training"** by Gen Li
note: Nan Duan, Yuejian Fang, Ming Gong, and Daxin Jiang (2019

title: Introduces Unicoder-VL, a universal encoder for vision and language tasks
**"Multimodal Transformer for Unaligned Multimodal Language Sequences"** by Amir Zadeh
Proposes a transformer-based model for handling unaligned multimodal sequences

author.literal: **"Multimodal Neural Machine Translation"** by Desmond Elliott, Stella Frank, Khalil Sima'an, and Lucia Specia

title: Explores the use of multimodal data (images and text) for improving machine translation
**"Multimodal Emotion Recognition from Speech and Text"** by Amir Zadeh
Discusses methods for recognizing emotions using both speech and text data
**"Multimodal Learning with Deep Boltzmann Machines"** by Nitish Srivastava and Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Introduces a deep Boltzmann machine model for learning from multimodal data
**"Multimodal Generative Models for Scalable Weakly-Supervised Learning"** by Maria-Florina Balcan
Discusses generative models for learning from multimodal data in a weakly-supervised setting
**"Multimodal Learning with Low-Rank Multimodal Fusion"** by Paul Pu Liang
Proposes a low-rank fusion method for combining multimodal data
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Automated ICD Coding"** by Yijia Liu
Explores the use of multimodal data for automated medical coding
**"Multimodal Learning for Video Classification"** by Andrej Karpathy, George Toderici, Sanketh Shetty, Thomas Leung, Rahul Sukthankar, and Li Fei-Fei
Discusses methods for video classification using multimodal data
**"Multimodal Learning for Robust RGB-D Object Recognition"** by Bo Li
Explores the use of RGB-D data for object recognition
**"Multimodal Learning for Human-Robot Interaction"** by Paul Pu Liang
Discusses the application of multimodal learning in human-robot interaction
**"Multimodal Learning for Image and Text"** by Richard Socher
Explores methods for learning from both image and text data
These articles provide a solid foundation for understanding the advancements and applications of multimodal machine learning up to
